ComicInfo.Title: Awakening II - Part 5
ComicInfo.Summary:
“AWAKENINGS II,” Part Five
In the wake of an officer-involved shooting, Rowan’s lies are threatening to unravel. The Ascension threatens tragedy for those closest to Rowan.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Nicola Scott & Eric Trautmann | 1 | | B | Cover B | Tula Lotay | 2 |
